items.content_html: A lightweight photo editor implemented in JavaScript. This open-source project allows users to perform basic photo editing tasks, including cropping, resizing, filters, and image adjustments. Seamlessly integrate into your web applications for an enhanced user experience.
items.title: SheheryarRamzan/JavaScript_PhotoEditor: A lightweight photo editor implemented in JavaScript. This open-source project allows users to perform basic photo editing tasks, including cropping, resizing, filters, and image adjustments. Seamlessly integrate into your web applications for an enhanced user experience.
